infos.title: Get Shareable Links
infos.contents: Click New Meeting to receive a link to send to people you want to invite to the meeting

infos.title: See all
infos.contents: To see more participants at the same time, go to the Change Layout in the More Options menu

infos.title: Schedule a meeting
infos.contents: Click New Meeting to schedule a meeting in Google Calendar and send invitations to participants.

infos.title: Safe meeting
infos.contents: Only userers invited or allowed by the host can join the meeting
